author: Louis Chilton, Louis Chilton
title: Samuel L Jackson performs swear-filled poem to warn people about coronavirus
description: Marvel star read a poem entitled 'Stay the f*** at home' on Jimmy Kimmel
content:
Samuel L Jackson has performed a swear-filled poem to warn people of the dangers of the coronavirus pandemic.
Appearing on the Jimmy Kimmel Live! talk show via video link, the veteran actor read from an updated version of the Adam Mansbach book Go the F*** t… [+1055 chars]
